about.title: About
about.description: Meet Leen Väränen - ceramicist and clothing designer
about.text:
I am Leen Väränen, a ceramicist and clothing designer whose work comes from the heart. In my works, tradition and modernity, form and function meet. I studied at Tallinn Industrial Education Centre and Vana-Vigala Technical and Service School, was a teacher for a long time and now focus entirely on creation.

My inspiration comes from forms, colors and lived memories. Every object I create has its own story - it can be a childhood memory, nature or simple beauty that I have noticed somewhere.

highlights.education: Studied at Tallinn Industrial Education Centre and Vana-Vigala Technical and Service School
highlights.inspiration: Inspired by forms, colors and lived memories
